com.compendium.meeting.remote
Interface RemoteRecord

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RecordListener
public interface RemoteRecord
extends java.rmi.Remote

Indicates that the object can have recording started and stopped

Method Summary
 boolean startRecording(boolean isReplay)
          Start a meeting recording of the type passed.
 boolean startRecording(java.lang.String sSetupData)
          Start an inital meeting recording.
 boolean startRecording(java.lang.String sSetupData, java.lang.String sReplayData)
          Start a meeting replay recording.
 boolean stopRecording()
          Stops the recording
 

Method Detail

startRecording

boolean startRecording(java.lang.String sSetupData,
                       java.lang.String sReplayData)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Start a meeting replay recording. Extract the setup data first, and the Jabber data.

Parameters:
sSetupData - the memetic setup data required to communicate with Area/Triplestore.
sReplayData - the meeting replay Jabber account details required.
Returns:
true if the recording was started successfully, else false;
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

startRecording

boolean startRecording(java.lang.String sSetupData)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Start an inital meeting recording. Extract the setup data first then start.

Parameters:
sSetupData - the memetic setup data required to communicate with Area/Triplestore.
Returns:
true if the recording was started successfully, else false;
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

startRecording

boolean startRecording(boolean isReplay)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Start a meeting recording of the type passed.

Parameters:
isReplay - true if the recording to start is for a replay, false if it is for a initial meeting recording.
Returns:
true if the recording was started successfully, else false;
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

stopRecording

boolean stopRecording()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Stops the recording

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
